job_details.degree_required: BS in computer science or engineering degree or a related field or equivalent work experience required.

jd: From: sanjoo singh, tekpyramid sanjoo@tekpyramids.com Reply to: sanjoo@tekpyramids.com Onsite role Weehawken NJ need local Database DeveloperWeehawken, NJ12+ MonthsPhone/Skype Hire US Citizen Only ! Requirements :  BS in computer science or engineering degree or a related field or equivalent work experience required. Experience in Requirement Analysis, Strategic Analysis, Software Development Fundamentals, Design, Development, Maintenance, Testing and Implementation of efficient data flow and batch processes in applications. Experience in TSQL programming, Perl or Python and Shell scripting. Good understanding of relation transactional databases like Sybase and MSSQL is a MUST;. Strong knowledge of Extraction Transformation and Loading (ETL) processes using TSQL with Java/Perl scripting. Experience in TSQL code development, performance tuning, query optimization and batch or ETL creation experience Best Regards ,Sanjoo SinghTechincal Recruiter Contact :- 248-707-1996 Ext.310Email : sanjoo@tekpyramids.com Fax : 248-856-9456 100, E.
